title: Bees Knees Tees Super Fly T-Shirt in 11 Colours
features: 100% Premium Cotton (Other than grey which is 10% Polyester)
Long lasting T-Shirt, with outstanding print quality - stand out from the crowd.
Chest sizes: Small = 34-36", Medium =38-40", Large = 42-44", XL = 46-48", XXL = 50-52", XXXL = 54-56"
Exact size, armpit to armpit: Small - 46cm, Medium - 51cm, Large - 56cm, XL - 61cm, XXL - 66cm, XXXL - 71cm
Exact length, collar to hem: Small - 71cm, Medium - 74cm, Large - 76cm, XL - 79cm, XXL - 81cm, XXXL - 84cm
description: Make an impression in this high quality gorgeous T-Shirt. It is hard wearing and made out of 100% cotton. We only use the highest quality print, so the design really stands out. 100% Satisfaction
